create_date.description: Date and time when the agent account was created.

departments.description: List of departments the agent is associated with.

enabled.description: Flag indicating if the agent account is enabled.

enabled_departments.description: List of departments where the agent is enabled.

last_login.description: Date and time of the agent's last login.

login_count.description: Total count of logins by the agent.

role_id.description: Identifier for the role assigned to the agent.

administrator.description: Flag indicating if the agent has administrator role.

owner.description: Flag indicating if the agent has owner role.

scope.description: Scope of access for the agent.

skills.description: List of skills possessed by the agent.
